OOC: Yanshosh is going to kick his ass if he says the Kamehameha. Don't you
mean DBZ? I'm a big fan, and would not ever spell it incorrectly, but I
understand typos. But I am one who would prefer that DBZ stayed out of this
RPG, if you want a DBZ RPG, then go here,
http://dbzstillfighting.homestead.com/Home.html but NBW is an RPG for
Transformers, remember that, please...
